tool_description: API to request the Aliexpress data for dropshipping activity.
name: Flance AliExpress
title: Flance AliExpress

api_list.name: product_id
api_list.description: Get Aliexpress Data by Product Id
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://flance-aliexpress.p.rapidapi.com/get_item_by_id/32656173352"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "flance-aliexpress.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://flance-aliexpress.p.rapidapi.com/get_item_by_id/{product_id}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "flance-aliexpress.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
